sentence.Network_en: I will return, find you, love you, marry you and live without shame.
sentence.Network_cn: 我会回去，找到你，爱你，娶你，活的光明正大。《赎罪》

sentence.Network_en: In many societies children still marry someone of their parents' choice.
sentence.Network_cn: 在许多社会，子女结婚仍然只能听从父母之命。

sentence.Network_en: I think he wanted to marry her, if I am not mistaken.
sentence.Network_cn: 我觉得他曾经想娶她为妻，如果我没有弄错的话。

phrase.cizu_name: marry in haste, repent at leisure

jx.jx_en_mean: (proverb)those who rush impetuously into marriage may spend a long time regretting doing so

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French marier, from Latin maritare, from maritus, literally 'married', (as a noun) 'husband'
late Middle English: variant of Mary

entry.def: When two people get married or marry, they legally become husband and wife in a special ceremony. Get married is less formal and more commonly used than marry .

example.ex: I thought he would change after we got married...
example.tran: 我原以为我们结婚后他会改变的。

example.ex: They married a month after they met...
example.tran: 他们相识一个月后就结婚了。

entry.def: When a priest or official marries two people, he or she conducts the ceremony in which the two people legally become husband and wife.

example.ex: The local vicar has agreed to marry us in the chapel on the estate...
example.tran: 当地的牧师已经同意在庄园的小教堂里为我们主持婚礼。

example.ex: In July 1957, we were married in New York.
example.tran: 我们于1957年7月在纽约举行了婚礼。

entry.def: If a parent marries their child to someone, the parent chooses who their child will marry and arranges it.

example.ex: He married his three daughters to princes of the ruling house.
example.tran: 他把三个女儿都嫁给了王室的王子。

auth_sentence.content: I think I picked the right person to marry.

auth_sentence.content: Neither of them was in a hurry to marry.

Sentence.sentence: At 33 she married Edward Green, a multi-millionaire, and had two children, Ned and Sylvia.
Many societies throughout history and around the world today have cultivated strong pressures to stay married.

If we ask Americans why they eat with knives and forks, or why their men wear pants instead of skirts, or why they may be married to only one person at a time, we are likely to get similar and very uninformative answers: "Because it's right.
During that time, he married one of his students, Natasha Willoughby M: Yes, go on
In America, people are faced with more and more decisions every day, whether it's picking one of thirty-one ice cream flavors, or deciding whether and when to get married.

sentences.en: John is going to marry Mary.

sentences.cn: 拜伦娶了个有遗产的女人。

sentences.en: Let's meet by that bridge where the rivers marry.
sentences.cn: 我们就在河流会合处的那座桥边见面吧。

sentences.en: This poem marries theme and style well.
sentences.cn: 这首诗的主题和风格结合得很好。

jushi.english: Marry in haste and repent at leisure.
They are in love with each other and wish to marry.
jushi.chinese: 他们相互热恋,希望能够结婚。

jushi.english: She married well and happily and was a devoted mother and wife.
jushi.chinese: 她婚姻美满幸福,是位尽职的母亲和忠实的妻子。
